title: Identify the a and b.
text: Identify the a, b, and n of $${\left(a+b\right)}^n$$. Here, $$a=2x$$, $$b=-3y$$, $$n=4$$.

title: Use the binomial theorm.
text: Follow the binomial theorem from this image.\n##figure1.gif##

title: Substitude into the binomial theorem.
text: Substitue the a, b, and n that you found into the binomial equation.

title: Simplify.
text: Simplify, resulting in $$16x^4-96x^3 y^1+16x^2 y^2-216x^1 y^3+81y^4$$.
